amendment.description: An amendment numbered 102 printed in House Report 116-459 to reduce funding for the EPA Environmental programs and management to match the President's FY 21 budget request.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the EPA Environmental programs and management to match the President's FY 21 budget request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A009) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 256 (Roll no. 164).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A009) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A009) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 256 (Roll no. 164).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A009) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 155 - 256 (Roll no. 164).
